status project estimates vs actuals resource requests for clarity determined atrisk and resource allocation decisions Maintained the Project Cost Workbooks across multiple projects Reconciled invoices with Ariba with CA PPM Clarity reports to determine project cost spend for the month Monitored project budgets and reviewed project expenses to determine whether allocated fundshours are spent as
